ComicInfo.Summary:
Bad Kitty is back guest starring Chastity! All Catherine Bell wanted to do was see her parents. She didn't want to become entangled in the midst of a 400-year-old prophecy that would determine the future of all Were-kind. She didn't want to battle side-by-side with a sassy renegade vampire, or protect a precocious 10-year-old girl from an ancient fiend who has toppled empires with his ambition. She didn't want her precious cat Lucky to fall prey to the curse of the wolf, or to have to deal with FBI who seem to be getting close and closer with each passing moment. But more than anything, more than life itself, she never wanted to put her father at the center of it all. A wise man once said, "We can't always get what we want." Time to his the streets of New York City with this cat!
